name: SUPERHOTLINE GUS
description:
Hi this is my first game ever, its inspired off of hotline miami and superhot. its got that retro vibe with slowmotion upon no movement, i'm like super duper new at making games so it's not really high quality and i'm only 15 so with school and all i only i have a little window of time to do this project.

 i cant allow donations since im not 18 and so tax stuff becomes complicated but heres my paypal:

https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/memetown69
